resources.string: This label is currently in use. Labels must be unique.
Some message about creating a recording
FastPhrase Team (left to right): Jennings Fairchild, Justin Tan, Matt Dyl, Bob Tim, Wesley Vance

FastPhrase was created at Texas A&M University for the team\'s senior design project. It was made under the guidance of Dr. Robin Murphy to be used for the refugee crisis off the coast of Turkey/Greece.
